Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Wonderful experience. Food was good. If you get the chance to gon order the truffle fries and the shrimp and grits. I am New Orleans born and raised and they got the shrimp and grits right.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Beautiful facility but horrible food service. Attended a family event that started at 7 pm but the food was not served until 9:30 pm. And it may as well had not been served. The smashed potatoes were stone cold, the steak undercooked or …

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: We had a private group for a graduation lunch. It was amazing!

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Awesome views of the city.  Great work event setting.  Food and service are excellent.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Very unhappy with my harbor club membership. Discriminatory dress code and unfriendly service. Not only was the dress code enforced due to one of my clients wearing sandals, but the gentleman who enforced it was rude, he got right in my …

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Private club with a great vibe! Had bites and a glass of wine when we drove to Charleston for a quick weekend trip. Saw fireworks over the harbour. Great location.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Food was loaded with flavor, staff friendly, service good and welcoming. Looking forward to our next visit!

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Went here on their First year Anniversary at this location as a guest of my Dad, he's a member. It was my 54th Birthday and I wanted to check this place out, saw an old friend who is a member and went to the Anniversary party, had a good time.  Live band, good food 2 open bars, very nice evening.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Always the best service, exquisite food, and eclectic drink selection. It’s a little taste of what an all inclusive resort feels like. You are spoiled!

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Beautiful venue

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Tried to meet with my business partners who are members but received an unwelcoming boot because we were wearing sandals.  Its 90 degrees in Charleston.  Update your dress code.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Went with neighbors for happy hour.  The bar area is so nice!  We shared some appetizers and the food was really good. Beautiful views!

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: I visited the harbor Club not really knowing what to expect. But to my delight I found it to be wonderful, exciting and filled with southern charm! The staff was exceptional. They were obviously trained very well. The food was outstanding! …

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Lovely and charming for a small wedding. The staff is very friendly and helpful.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: The service was awesome! It was my first visit and the most impressive thing was the 16oz lobster tail!  OMG it was so succulent it melted in my mouth.  I placed a 3-4oz tail in the picture to show the size comparison. …

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: The dinners and cocktails were exquisite (Lamb, T-Bone, Clams over pasta and Filet Mignon). The  service before during and after our meal was 5 star. The caramel salted cake is my new favorite dessert!!! I highly recommend.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: The Harbour Club was amazing! I enjoyed the tartine plate during a breakfast meeting. Great new space and very clean. As always, the staff is very hospitable.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Attended a friend's wedding here in December 2018. Venue was perfect for a small (<50 guests) wedding. The staff was friendly and accommodating for the guests, the catering was outstanding, and the rooftop patio provides a nice backdrop for a ceremony (weather permitting).

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: My gosh, the chateaubriand was excellent! So tender you could cut it with a fork. Glad I chose that. As always, John, the manager was very welcoming and humorous. He adds so much wonderful personality to the place. …

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Our daughter held her wedding here in May 2017 and we could not have been more pleased!  It was a destination wedding, which added to the stress of planning, but Shannon could not have been more helpful.  The wedding had to be reseceduled …

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Went for R&B night.  They struggled.  Dance floor kept separating making it somewhat dangerous if you weren't careful.   Dance floor way to small for the number of patrons.  Dancing on carpet was hard.  Music was great though.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: I see some old reviews here, I am a current and new member and was in the club biz for my first career. This club is awesome and the service and value is top notch.  Fantastic mix of young and veteran members.  Club is making improvements in many areas and the atmosphere is great.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: We loved having our wedding at Habour Club in Charleston. The location was perfect, Shannon was great to work with and even was so sweet to help us on our crazy travels with being out of town to schedule a time to meet with the chef, …

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: The Harbour Club is an awesome place for most folks but not for everyone. The Club itself is centrally located in the heart of Downtown Charleston with excellent parking. The Staff is all about providing you the service you would expect and …

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: We met a colleague at The Harbour Club for a conference. While we are not members, and do not have privileges there, we have been there for many events. The club was undergoing renovations and we had to meet in the dining room. The staff was kind, gracious and attentive. There was not too much construction noise.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Poor  Hospitality Service!!!  We have friends that have canceled their membership service for the same reason.  Unjustified overly snobby, pretentious club that really isn't all that in food or service.  They have taken the hospitality out …

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Delicious dinner! The she crab soup and crab cakes were awesome! Dee was our server and she was excellent. The chef even came out to say hello. So enjoyed our evening!

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text:
I have never been to a worse party with the embarrassing food we were served tonight.
Come on Chef! Really????? Three kinds of naked sliders, cornbread with a lemon …

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: This is my job! I'm a bartender in the lounge and I also work the Banquets this is an amazing place to be! Weddings graduation ceremonies or maybe just a meeting with your friends come see us we'd love to have you

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Our entire experience was excellent.  The staff was attentive,  presentation of our meal was superb!! I recommended the Harbour Club 100%.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Awful experience. Bread and desserts were stale. Steak was ordered medium rare and came out very rare. Menu said arugula with the beef carpaccio, it came with iceberg. They did not have the Sauvignon Blanc we ordered. They could not find …

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: As a member of the Harbour Club for approximately 18 months, I have mixed reviews. I believe some of the staff are exceptional including Tonya as well as Donna. Their service is exceptional. …

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Had a awesome time and experience there.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Exceptional Club: Superlative location, service, food and beverage, and great working/networking caps.  Plus wine club, book club, whiskey club... A game changer

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Food was outstanding, atmosphere was top notch, rooftop bar 5 star! Jim and staff really make it happen they all worked hard to make sure everything was pleasant!

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Had a great lunch here, the staff was outstanding!

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: The Harbour offers an awesome experience where there is great food and friendly people.  The staff and the members are warm, charming and really fun.  This is one of the gems of Charleston.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Love it. Excellent food and service. Great meeting and party facilities. Nice members, respectful but love a good time. Active club.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Always a fantastic experience! One of my fave spots and a cool view 🙂

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Very accommodating staff and a great venue for a large variety of events!  The food and beverages are always mouth watering.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: The Chef is very creative and the staff is friendly. It's better than eating with family...And you don't have to do the dishes.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Very nice establishment! Attended a Charleston AMA event here and the service/food was great.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Food was good but service needs to be managed a bit more

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Delicious food and awesome drinks with beautiful skyline views of Charleston!

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Went to a friend's wedding here and everything was gorgeous. I enjoyed this venue very much.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: Nice facility. Good service. Beautiful views.

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: More like a seniors home than a business club.  Have been to many Club Corp clubs, this one falls far below their standards.

Review Text: High class food and drink

Name: The Harbour Club Kitchen
Review Text: In a city of great restaurants, the Harbour Club is at the top.  The staff is always friendly and accommodating.

Review Text: Great atmosphere, great food, right down town in beautiful Charleston.

Review Text: we had a nice family meeting upstairs in the room.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.

Review Text: What a great venue! We were impressed!

Review Text: Nice place The food was excellent, and the parking is a breeze. There is a garage 2 blocks away.

Review Text: The hospitality and service at this place is unbelievable and so was the food. Thanks for fitting us in
